ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup CARAPELLI® Extra Virgin Olive Oil
8 slices rustic Italian or sourdough bread
4  whole, well-drained bottled roasted red peppers, cut into strips

cookingTips: Brush both sides of bread with olive oil for golden, crispy exterior
Use a panini press or skillet with weight to create proper compression and cheese melting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Panini sandwiches are about achieving the perfect balance of crispy exterior and melted interior. How will you build your layers for best flavor integration?
